PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03492022-04-06,  ,  ISED,  , 
ActTelecommunications Act
SubjectDecline to vary or rescind Telecom Regulatory Policy Decision CRTC 2021-130
PrecisOrder declining to vary, rescind, or refer back to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) for reconsideration the Telecom Regulatory Policy Decision CRTC 2021-130, thereby letting it stand.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Decline to vary or rescind Telecom Regulatory Policy Decision CRTC 2021-130
precis: Order declining to vary, rescind, or refer back to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) for reconsideration the Telecom Regulatory Policy Decision CRTC 2021-130, thereby letting it stand.
